channel.title: Brazil – Vamos a Bailar
channel.description: A traveling blog for discovering South America

item.title: Caïpirinha workshop
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
The workshop Another activity I did in Florianopolis, making caipirinhas. It is not new, that I loved cocktails. I have a small bar in France, still waiting for me to practice. Brazil is renowned for the cachaca and the famous cocktail: caipirinha. It is just: lemon, cachaca, sugar and ice. I decided to replace the […]

The post Caïpirinha workshop appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: A long stay in Florianopolis
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
A long stay After traveling for many times, I got tired of moving all the time. So finally, instead of continuing visiting Brazil, I decided to settle down at Florianopolis. Also, I already did a trip 2 years ago in the Northern part of Brazil. I stayed in the neighborhood of Fortaleza close to Barra […]

The post A long stay in Florianopolis appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: With the brothers in Porto Alegre
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
I stopped in Porto Alegre mainly for meeting people than for the place. The city has some nice buildings to see but nothing astonishing. It is more a student city, since universities are good. A stay with the salist brothers I spent my nights in another big city close to Porto Alegre, Canoas. The salist […]

The post With the brothers in Porto Alegre appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.
